text:
Martin, Gomez and Franco is a leading technology firm that values diversity and inclusivity. We are seeking a highly experienced Senior Manager of Software Development & Engineering to lead our team of talented engineers.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:
The Senior Manager of Software Development & Engineering will be responsible for overseeing the design, development, and implementation of our software products. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, excellent leadership skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.

Responsibilities:
- Lead a team of software engineers and developers to design, develop, and test software products
- Collaborate with product management to define product requirements and develop project plans
- Ensure timely delivery of high-quality software products
- Foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning
- Manage budgets and resources to achieve project goals

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- At least 5 years of experience in software development and engineering
- Proven track record of successful project delivery
- Excellent leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Recognition and rewards for outstanding performance

We welcome talented individuals from all walks of life to join our team. Equal opportunities for all candidates are provided, and we support refugee talent integration.
